scripts.gen: prisma generate --schema prisma/schema.prisma && ts-node ./cmd/schemaGen.ts && yarn tsc:check
scripts.test:apk: docker run -h docker-nginx -i -t --rm --mount type=bind,source=\\\"$(pwd)/\\\",target=\\\"/config\\\" -w /config node:18-alpine node_modules/.bin/ts-node cmd/cli.ts examples/recipes/nginx
scripts.docs:watch: docker run --rm -it --entrypoint /bin/sh -p 8000:8000 -v $(pwd):/docs "$(yarn docs:build-docker)" -ec 'exec mkdocs serve "--dev-addr=$(ip route get 1 | awk '"'{print \$NF;exit}'"'):8000"'
scripts.docs:build: docker run --rm -t --entrypoint /bin/sh -v $(pwd):/docs "$(yarn docs:build-docker)" -ec 'set -e; mkdocs build; ls -al /docs/site'
scripts.dist:pkg:agent:win:x64: ts-node cmd/pkg.ts --outDir dist --entryPoint cmd/agent.ts --nodePlatform win --nodeArch x64
scripts.dist:pkg:agent:win:arm64: ts-node cmd/pkg.ts --outDir dist --entryPoint cmd/agent.ts --nodePlatform win --nodeArch arm64
scripts.dist:pkg:agent:linux:x64: ts-node cmd/pkg.ts --outDir dist --entryPoint cmd/agent.ts --nodePlatform linux --nodeArch x64
scripts.dist:pkg:agent:linux:arm64: ts-node cmd/pkg.ts --outDir dist --entryPoint cmd/agent.ts --nodePlatform linux --nodeArch arm64
scripts.dist:pkg:agent:linux:arm: ts-node cmd/pkg.ts --outDir dist --entryPoint cmd/agent.ts --nodePlatform linux --nodeArch arm
scripts.dist:pkg:agent:darwin:x64: ts-node cmd/pkg.ts --outDir dist --entryPoint cmd/agent.ts --nodePlatform darwin --nodeArch x64
scripts.dist:pkg:agent:darwin:arm64: ts-node cmd/pkg.ts --outDir dist --entryPoint cmd/agent.ts --nodePlatform darwin --nodeArch arm64
scripts.dist:pkg:cli:win:x64: ts-node cmd/pkg.ts --outDir dist --entryPoint cmd/cli.ts --nodePlatform win --nodeArch x64
scripts.dist:pkg:cli:linux:x64: ts-node cmd/pkg.ts --outDir dist --entryPoint cmd/cli.ts --nodePlatform linux --nodeArch x64
